# formatOptions

**Instance Property**

Options for generating and parsing ISO 8601 date representations. See [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ISO8601DateFormatter/Options] for possible values.

## Declaration

```swift
var formatOptions: ISO8601DateFormatter.Options { get set }
```

## Discussion

The ISO 8601 specification allows for dates to be expressed in a variety of ways. You can configure the format used to parse and generate representations by specifying various combinations of format options.





## Configuring the Formatter

- **timeZone**: The time zone used to create and parse date representations. When unspecified, GMT is used.
